page.title: 12THE CULWORTH FORGE
page.content: The village blacksmith is one of a few who have survived in this area.He works at the forge which is believed to be about 500yrs old.he has worked there for 16yrs,he is also co-director of Culworth Engineering Ltd.His main task at the forge is shoeing horses as there are many throughout the area. {************************** *CULWORTH FORGE,THE GREEN* ************************** } CONTACT US FOR ::::::::::::::::: WALL LIGHTS GATES FIRE GUARDS FIRE BASKETS FOOT SCRAPERS FIRE DOGS FIRE CANOPIES WEATHER VANES RAILINGS HORSE SHOEING CHARGES OPERATIVE 1985 SUPPLY AND FIT NEW SHOES----$15:00 REFIT SHOES-----------------$10:00 TRIM FEET OF UNSHOD ANIMAL--$ 3:50 REMOVE SHOES AND TRIM FEET--$ 4:50 TRAVELLING CHARGE MINIMUM---$ 1:50
